title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A web based portfolio that showcase all of the projects I created throughout my journey as a web developer. Building this projects is fun and I gain a lot of knowledge about React Js Library and styled-components.

title: Employee Record Management System
description: My very first taste of backend development using  PHP and MySQL for database. This project is our final requirements to our subject Advance Database System during our second Semester of our sophomore year. For educational purposes, this system is not a full pledge employee management system as this is only a very simple system for us to perform CRUD operations and apply MySQL clauses. Unfortunately this system is not yer responsive so we advise it to view the live link in laptop devices that has a width resolution of 1024px to 1920px.
